styles.label: Modern
styles.description: Clean lines, vibrant gradients, contemporary iconography
styles.prompt: Use a modern, professional design with clean lines, vibrant gradients, and contemporary iconography. Emphasize hierarchy and visual balance.

styles.label: Minimalist
styles.description: Simple shapes, limited colors, ample white space
styles.prompt: Use a minimalist design with ample white space, simple geometric shapes, limited color palette (2-3 colors), and clean typography. Focus on essential elements only.

styles.label: Whiteboard
styles.prompt: Create a whiteboard-style illustration with hand-drawn elements, sketchy lines, simple stick figures or icons, and a casual, brainstorming aesthetic.

styles.label: Flowchart
styles.prompt: Design a structured flowchart-style diagram with clear boxes, arrows, decision diamonds, and process flow indicators. Use standard flowchart symbols and connectors.

styles.label: Cartoon
styles.prompt: Use a playful cartoon style with rounded shapes, bright cheerful colors, friendly character illustrations, and a fun, approachable aesthetic.

styles.label: Photographic
styles.prompt: Create a photorealistic composite with realistic textures, lighting, shadows, and 3D-rendered elements that look like physical objects or real environments.

styles.label: Material Design
styles.prompt: Use Google Material Design principles with elevation shadows, floating action buttons, bold colors, and card-based layouts.

styles.label: iOS Style
styles.prompt: Follow Apple iOS design guidelines with subtle shadows, rounded corners, system fonts, and clean navigation patterns.

styles.label: Flat Design
styles.prompt: Use flat design with no shadows or gradients, bold solid colors, simple geometric shapes, and clear typography.

styles.label: Neumorphic
styles.prompt: Apply neumorphic (soft UI) design with subtle shadows creating extruded or pressed effects, monochromatic palette, and soft 3D appearances.

styles.label: Glassmorphic
styles.prompt: Create glassmorphism effects with frosted glass aesthetics, blur effects, translucent layers, and vibrant backgrounds.

styles.label: Corporate
styles.prompt: Use professional corporate styling with conservative colors (blues, grays), formal typography, structured layouts, and business-appropriate imagery.

styles.label: Material Design
styles.prompt: Use Google Material Design for mobile with bottom navigation, FABs, and card-based content.

styles.label: iOS Style
styles.prompt: Follow iOS mobile design with tab bar, navigation bar, and iOS-specific UI patterns and gestures.

styles.label: Flat Design
styles.prompt: Use flat mobile design with simple tap targets, clear icons, and minimal visual effects.

styles.label: Neumorphic
styles.prompt: Apply neumorphic mobile design with soft shadows and subtle 3D button effects.

styles.label: Glassmorphic
styles.prompt: Create mobile glassmorphism with frosted panels, translucent navigation, and blur effects.

styles.label: Corporate
styles.prompt: Use professional mobile styling appropriate for enterprise or business applications.

styles.label: Photographic
styles.description: Realistic photos of people using apps
styles.prompt: Create photorealistic scenes showing real people interacting with the application on devices. Use professional photography lighting, realistic environments, and authentic human interactions with screens and interfaces.

styles.label: Illustration
styles.prompt: Create illustrated scenes showing stylized people interacting with the application. Use consistent illustration style, simplified human figures, and artistic representations of devices and interfaces.

styles.label: Lifestyle
styles.prompt: Create lifestyle photography showing people naturally using the application in real-world contexts - offices, homes, cafes, etc. Emphasize authentic scenarios and natural interactions.

styles.label: Professional
styles.prompt: Create professional scenes showing people using the application in business environments. Use corporate settings, professional attire, and business-appropriate contexts.

styles.label: Isometric
styles.prompt: Create isometric 3D illustrations showing people and devices from an elevated angle. Use consistent isometric perspective, stylized characters, and geometric representations of technology.

styles.label: Abstract
styles.prompt: Create abstract, artistic representations of people interacting with technology. Use shapes, colors, and symbolic representations rather than realistic depictions.
